verse: अथ खलु सोम्येनं सनातनमात्मधर्मं वैष्णवीं निष्ठां नासमाप्य प्रबूयात्। नानूचानाय नानात्मविदे नावीतरागाय नाविशुद्धाय नानुपसन्नाय नाप्रयतमानसायेति ह स्माहुः। तदेतदृचाभ्युक्तम् । विद्या ह वै ब्राह्मणमाजगाम गोपाय मां शेवधिष्टेऽहमस्मि । असूयकायानृजवे । शठाय मा मा ब्रूया वीर्यवती तथा स्याम्॥

terms.न अवीतरागाय: not for those devoid of detachment
terms.न अप्रयतमानसाय: not for those who are not striving
terms.तदेतदृचाभ्युक्तम्: this has been spoken in accordance with truth
terms.असूयकायानृजवे: for the envious and dishonest one
terms.O gentle one, now indeed, one should not: nature, Vaishnava, without attaining it. This is spoken of not for the envious, those lacking self-knowledge, those devoid of detachment, those impure, those lacking devotion, and those who are not striving. Thus it has been spoken in accordance with truth.

meaning: Meaning:Knowledge indeed is Brahman, and I am approached and worshipped for protection. For the envious and dishonest one, do not speak. So be it, for valor.
